body_html: You are not doing torch.cuda.synchronize, so your GPU timings are likely off. The fact that CPU timings changed after @65b6626 is incredibly strange, as it concerns GPU only. Likely also due to lack of synchronization, because CPU and GPU performance is measured in the same loop. For that matter, the fact that even GPU performance changed after @65b6626 is also strange, because it concerns multi-GPU only, and your benchmark is single GPU.

body: You are not doing torch.cuda.synchronize, so your GPU timings are likely off. The fact that CPU timings changed after @65b6626 is incredibly strange, as it concerns GPU only. Likely also due to lack of synchronization, because CPU and GPU performance is measured in the same loop. For that matter, the fact that even GPU performance changed after @65b6626 is also strange, because it concerns multi-GPU only, and your benchmark is single GPU.
